name: GameofThronesTrivia
0:
”Alexa, start game of thrones facts”
”Alexa, launch game of thrones facts”
”Alexa, open game of thrones facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: game of thrones facts
des:
Shocked when your colleague told you about that Hollywood gossip? Want to contribute to conversations?
Look no further! Just say"Alexa, start game of thrones facts" and you will be privy to some exclusive game of thrones trivia and facts. Shock that friend the next time you are speaking by surprising him/her with your new found game of thrones knowledge. With frequent updates, you can be sure that you will keep learning something new and interesting every day. So what are you waiting for just enable this skill and say "Alexa, start game of thrones facts".
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
